emote.label: emote to check
emote.tooltip: the emote from which the time since last usage is checked

min_time.tooltip: maximum time since last emote usage to have a success
min_time.label: maximum time for success

user_cd.tooltip: user specific cooldown on the command
user_cd.label: user Cooldown(secdonds)

global_cd.tooltip: global cooldown for all users on the command
global_cd.label: global Cooldown(secdonds)

reward_global.tooltip: check to reward all users on success instead of only the caller
reward_global.label: reward all users?

cost.tooltip: cost on failure of the command
cost.label: cost

reward.tooltip: reward on success of the command
reward.label: reward

send_warning.tooltip: send a warning if the user has not enough currency points
send_warning.label: send warning

currency_name.label: currency name
currency_name.tooltip: what name do you use for your currency?

success_resp.value: {0}, the emote {1} has been used within the last {2} seconds. all users have been rewarded {3} {4}
success_resp.label: success msg
success_resp.tooltip: message to be displayed when emote has been used within specified time

fail_resp.value: {0}, the emote {0} has not been used within the last {2} seconds. it cost hem {3} {4}
fail_resp.label: fail msg
fail_resp.tooltip: message to be displayed when emote has not been used within specified time

warning_resp.value: {0} does not have enough {1} to use this command
warning_resp.label: warning msg
warning_resp.tooltip: message to be shown if user doesn't have enough currency points
